sys_script_include.description: A function that contains a number of anti-patterns. The script is intended to trigger findings in the CodeSanity scan suite to test and demonstrate the checks.
sys_script_include.name: AntiPatterns

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_a9a9745bdb0e8510bcced03cd39619ff
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_codesanity.AntiPatterns</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>A function that contains a number of anti-patterns. The script is intended to trigger findings in the CodeSanity scan suite to test and demonstrate the checks. </description><name>AntiPatterns</name><script><![CDATA[function AntiPatterns()
{
	

	// The string concatenation anti-pattern to avoid the sys_id anti-pattern check
	var strSysId2 = "123456789012345678"+"90123456789012";
	gs.info(strSysId2);

	
	// Use of the Date() constructor without parameters
	var date = Date();

	// Using the bracket-dot anti-pattern
	var aArray = new Array().push('some value');
	
	// Putting opening curly brackets in the same line
	if (1 == 1) {
		gs.info('Hello World');
	}
	
	// Using the application names in code:
	var strAppName = 'CodeSanity';
	var strAppNameWIP = 'CodeSanity WORK IN PROGRESS';
	var strDevToolsAppName = 'DevTools';
	var strDevToolsAppNameWIP = 'DevTools WORK IN PROGRESS';	
	
	// Debug output
	Debug('huhu');
	gs.debug('This is not good!');
	
	// Finally throwing an exception
	throw 'This is so anti-social!';	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-10 12:22:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>a9a9745bdb0e8510bcced03cd39619ff</sys_id><sys_mod_count>33</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AntiPatterns</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CodeSanity WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_codesanity">8ed42c23dbad0510bcced03cd39619ce</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="CodeSanity WORK IN PROGRESS">8ed42c23dbad0510bcced03cd39619ce</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a9a9745bdb0e8510bcced03cd39619ff</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-12 14:02:32</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
